PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To investigate the photovoltaic properties of the NDT - based semiconductor , PSC devices with a configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / Ca / Al were fabricated.

Let's think step by step.

```
| Property Value |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer : PC71BM |
| Ca |
| Al |
```
In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entities are the names of the materials used in the fabrication of the PSC devices. They are:

* ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
* PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) : Poly(styrene sulfonate))
* polymer : PC71BM (Polymer : [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester)
* Ca (Calcium)
* Al (Aluminum)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PC71BM |
| Ca |
| Al |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, the following entities do not clearly refer to the "Value of material property":

* PSC (Photovoltaic properties of the NDT - based semiconductor)
* NDT (Not clearly defined in the given paragraph)

The valid entities that refer to the "Value of material property" are:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PC71BM |
| Ca |
| Al |

These entities are the names of the materials used in the fabrication of the PSC devices, which are relevant to the investigation of the photovoltaic properties.
